DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess effectiveness two treatment Physiotherapy : one joint traction , passive muscle stretch Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation ( PNF ) , education session home exercise , improvement ROM , biceps strength , perimeter arm perception pain PwH arthropathy elbow .
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention carry twelve week , perform evaluation treatment , six month finalize . The treatment MT group consist two session per week , one hour , treatment group E consist session 90 minute every two week , daily home exercise . The control group ( group C ) receive intervention .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year Patients diagnose hemophilia A B Patients hemophilic arthropathy one elbow Patients another medical diagnosis ( eg , Von Willebrand 's disease ) Patients presence antibody FVIII FIX ( inhibitor ) Patients haemarthrosis elbow study
